original_text: So death is near to us, even as we live. But as a result, we are bringing God's life to you.
korean_text: 그런즉 사망은 우리 안에서 역사하고 생명은 너희 안에서 역사하느니라

sentences.original_text: So death is near to us
we are bringing God's life to you
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님의 생명을 여러분에게 가져다주고 있습니다
